verses.verse: <S%G3306>Let<s%> brotherly <S%G5360>love<s%> <S%G3306>continue.<s%>

<S%G1950><s%> <S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G1950>forget<s%> to show hospitality to <S%G5381>strangers,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G3778>doing<s%> <S%G1223>so,<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> have <S%G3579>entertained<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> without knowing <S%G2990>it.<s%>

<S%G3403>Remember<s%> those who are in <S%G1198>bonds,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> bound with <S%G4887>them;<s%> and those who are <S%G2558>ill-treated,<s%> <S%G5613>since<s%> <S%G846>you<s%> <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body.<s%>

Let <S%G1062>marriage<s%> be held <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5093>honor<s%> among <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> let the <S%G2845>bed<s%> be <S%G283>undefiled:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G2919>judge<s%> the sexually <S%G4205>immoral<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3432>adulterers.<s%>

<S%G5158>Be<s%> free from the <S%G866>love<s%> of <S%G714>money,<s%> content with such things as you <S%G3918>have,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> has <S%G2046>said,<s%> "I <S%G447>will<s%> in <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3361>way<s%> <S%G447>leave<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> neither will I in <S%G3756>any<s%> <S%G3361>way<s%> <S%G1459>forsake<s%> <S%G4571>you.<s%>"

So <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G3004>with<s%> good <S%G2292>courage<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> "The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1698>my<s%> <S%G998>helper.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G5399>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5399>fear.<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> can <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G3427>me?<s%>"

<S%G3421>Remember<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2233>leaders,<s%> men <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to <S%G5216>you<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G333>considering<s%> the <S%G1545>results<s%> of <S%G3739>their<s%> <S%G391>conduct,<s%> <S%G3401>imitate<s%> their <S%G4102>faith.<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5504>yesterday,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4594>today,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%>

<S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G4064>be<s%> carried <S%G4064>away<s%> by <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3581>strange<s%> <S%G1322>teachings,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G950>that<s%> the <S%G2588>heart<s%> be <S%G950>established<s%> by <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> by <S%G1033>food,<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> those who were so <S%G4043>occupied<s%> <S%G5623>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4043>benefited.<s%>

We <S%G2192>have<s%> an <S%G2379>altar<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> those who <S%G3000>serve<s%> the holy <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849>right<s%> to <S%G5315>eat.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G4983>bodies<s%> <S%G2226>of<s%> <S%G5130>those<s%> <S%G2226>animals,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> is <S%G1533>brought<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the holy <S%G39>place<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the high <S%G749>priest<s%> as an offering <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> are <S%G2618>burned<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> of the <S%G3925>camp.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G37>sanctify<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> of the <S%G4439>gate.<s%>
Let us <S%G5106>therefore<s%> go <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> of the <S%G3925>camp,<s%> <S%G5342>bearing<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3680>reproach.<s%>
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2192>we<s%> <S%G5602>don't<s%> have here an <S%G3306>enduring<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2192>we<s%> <S%G1934>seek<s%> that which is to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

<S%G1223>Through<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> let us <S%G399>offer<s%> up a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> of <S%G133>praise<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1275>continually,<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G5491>of<s%> <S%G5491>lips<s%> which proclaim <S%G3670>allegiance<s%> <S%G3686>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G1950>forget<s%> to be doing <S%G2140>good<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2842>sharing,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> with <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is well <S%G2100>pleased.<s%>

<S%G3982>Obey<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> leaders <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5226>submit<s%> to <S%G1063>them,<s%> for <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G69>watch<s%> on <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> those who will <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G3056>account,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> with <S%G4727>groaning,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> would be <S%G255>unprofitable<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%>

<S%G4336>Pray<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> we are <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> <S%G2309>desiring<s%> to <S%G390>live<s%> <S%G2573>honorably<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things.<s%>
<S%G1161><s%> I <S%G4056>strongly<s%> <S%G3870>urge<s%> you to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I may be <S%G600>restored<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5032>sooner.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> may the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace,<s%> who brought <S%G321>again<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd<s%> of the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> with <S%G1242>the<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of an <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

<S%G2675>make<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2675>complete<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> <S%G4160>working<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> that which is well <S%G2101>pleasing<s%> <S%G1799>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1799>sight,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> be the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G430>endure<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2532>exhortation,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I have <S%G1989>written<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>in<s%> few <S%G1024>words.<s%>

<S%G1097>Know<s%> that our <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> has been <S%G630>freed,<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3739>whom,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G5032>shortly,<s%> I will <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>
